title: WHO chief said it was 'premature' to dismiss the coronavirus lab-leak theory because 'lab accidents happen'
content:
1. WHO chief said it was 'premature' to dismiss the coronavirus lab-leak theory because 'lab accidents happen'  Business Insider
  2. China should provide raw data on COVID-19 origins, WHO says  Reuters
  3. The WHO's Chief Says It Was Premature To Rule Out A Lab Leak As The Pandemic's Origin  NPR
  4. China should provide raw data on pandemic's origins: WHO  The Straits Times
  5. Covid: WHO urges China to co-operate better in virus origin probe  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
WHO chief said it was 'premature' to dismiss the coronavirus lab-leak theory because 'lab accidents happen'  Business Insider
China should provide raw data on COVID-19 origins, WHO says  Reuters
The WHO's Chief Says It Was Premature To Rule Out A Lab Leak As The Pandemic's Origin  NPR
China should provide raw data on pandemic's origins: WHO  The Straits Times
Covid: WHO urges China to co-operate better in virus origin probe  BBC News
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: WHO長官、「実験室での事故は起こる」としてコロナウイルスの実験室漏洩説を否定するのは「時期尚早」と発言
世卫组织负责人说，否定冠状病毒实验室泄漏理论是 "不成熟的"，因为 "实验室事故会发生"。
世衛組織負責人說，否定冠狀病毒實驗室泄漏理論是 "不成熟的"，因爲 "實驗室事故會發生"。
